00095         public List<Message> GetMessageList()
00096         {
00097             string ResponseString;
00098 
00099             List<Message> ReturnArray = new List<Message>();
00100             WriteMessage("LIST\r\n");
00101             ResponseString = GetResponse();
00102             if (!ResponseString.StartsWith("+OK", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00103             {
00104                 throw new Pop3Exception(ResponseString);
00105             }
00106             bool Done = false;
00107             while (!Done)
00108             {
00109                 Regex TempRegex = new Regex(Regex.Escape("+") + "OK.*\r\n");
00110                 ResponseString = TempRegex.Replace(ResponseString, "");
00111                 while(!ResponseString.EndsWith("\r\n.\r\n"))
00112                     ResponseString += GetResponse();
00113                 string[] Seperator = { "\r\n" };
00114                 string[] Values = ResponseString.Split(Seperator, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00115                 foreach (string Value in Values)
00116                 {
00117                     string[] NewSeperator = { " " };
00118                     string[] Pair = Value.Split(NewSeperator, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);
00119                     if (Pair.Length > 1)
00120                     {
00121                         Message TempMessage = new Message();
00122                         TempMessage.MessageNumber = Int32.Parse(Pair[0]);
00123                         TempMessage.MessageSize = Int32.Parse(Pair[1]);
00124                         TempMessage.Retrieved = false;
00125                         ReturnArray.Add(TempMessage);
00126                     }
00127                     else
00128                     {
00129                         Done = true;
00130                         break;
00131                     }
00132                 }
00133             }
00134             return ReturnArray;
